article_title: States that decline to expand Medicaid give up billions in aid
article_text: If the 23 states that have rejected expanding Medicaid under the 2010 health care law continue to do so for the next eight years, they’ll pay $152 billion to extend the program in other states _ while receiving nothing in return.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid, expansion, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, taxpayers, Pennsylvania
article_metadata.title: States that decline to expand Medicaid give up billions in aid | McClatchy DC
